item.description: RELEASE INFO: * Fix CTD by hiding game options if no game is selected CHANGES FROM v1.7: * Various bugfixes * Upgrade dependencies * Show more information in hash report and optimize performance by switching to listbox controls * Hopefully fix GUI corruption in linux workspaces (without upgrading avalonia to latest version) * Update Stellaris parser map for Stellaris v2.8
